            <div class="sharing-buttons mb-3"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u={{ request.build_absolute_uri|urlencode }}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary share-popup" title="{% translate 'Share on Facebook' %}"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a> <a href="https://x.com/intent/tweet?url={{ request.build_absolute_uri|urlencode }}&text={{ game.title|urlencode }}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary share-popup" title="{% translate 'Share on X' %}"><i class="fab fa-x-twitter"></i></a> <a href="https://wa.me/?text={{ game.title|urlencode }}%20{{ request.build_absolute_uri|urlencode }}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary" title="{% translate 'Share on WhatsApp' %}"><i class="fab fa-whatsapp"></i></a> <button id="copy-link-btn" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary" title="{% translate 'Copy link' %}"><i class="fas fa-link"></i></button> <span id="copy-link-success" class="text-success small ms-2" style="display: none;">{% translate 'Link copied!' %}</span></div>
        </div>
    </div>
    {# --- End Quick Summary --- #}
    <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
        <div class="content-descriptors">
            <h4 class="section-title">{% translate "Content Descriptors" %}</h4>
             {% for cat_prefix, concerns in grouped_mgc_concerns.items %}
                {% if concerns %} {# Only show category if it has non-'N' concerns #}
                    {# --- UPDATED H5 Tag --- #}
                    <h5 class="guide-subsection-title d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                        <span>{{ category_names|get_item:cat_prefix }}</span>
                        {% with category_severity_code=highest_severities|get_item:cat_prefix %}
                            {% if category_severity_code and category_severity_code != 'N' %}
                                {% with category_severity_display=severity_choices_dict|get_item:category_severity_code %}
                                    {% with category_severity_var_name="--severity-"|add:category_severity_code|lower|add:"-color" %}
                                        {# Apply dynamic color directly to the text, remove circle #}
                                        <span class="descriptor-severity ms-2" style="min-width: auto;">
                                            <span class="severity-label small" style="color: var({{ category_severity_var_name }});">
                                                {{ category_severity_display }}
                                            </span>
                                             {# Circle span removed #}
                                        </span>
                                    {% endwith %}
                                {% endwith %}
                            {% endif %}
                        {% endwith %}
                    </h5>
                    {# --- END UPDATED H5 Tag --- #}
                    <div class="row">
                        {% for concern in concerns %}
                            <div class="col-md-12"> {# Full width within this column #}
                                <div class="descriptor-item">
                                    <span class="descriptor-icon material-symbols-outlined" title="{{ concern.name }}">{{ concern.icon }}</span>
                                    <span class="descriptor-name">{{ concern.name }}</span>
                                    <span class="descriptor-severity">
                                        <span class="severity-label">{{ concern.severity_display }}</span>
                                        <span class="severity-circle {{ concern.severity_class }}"></span>
                                    </span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </div>
                {% endif %}
             {% empty %}
                 <p class="text-secondary small fst-italic">{% translate "No specific MGC content concerns noted." %}</p>
             {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
   {# --- Quick Summary --- #}
    <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
        <div class="quick-summary mb-3">
            <h4 class="section-title">{% translate "Rating Summary" %}</h4>
            <div class="quick-summary-content">
                {% if game.summary %}<p>{{ game.summary|linebreaksbr }}</p>{% endif %}
                {% if not game.summary %}
                    <p class="text-secondary">{% translate "No summary available." %}</p>
                {% endif %}
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-12">
        <div class="user-contributions-section" id="user-contributions-section">
            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center flex-wrap mb-3">
                 <h4 class="section-title mb-0 border-0 pb-0">{% translate "Community Feedback" %}</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center flex-wrap mb-3">
                {% if user.is_authenticated and user.is_active %}
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-success" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#contributionModal"><span class="material-symbols-outlined small-icon me-1">edit_note</span>{% translate "Add/Edit Contribution" %}</button>
                {% elif user.is_authenticated and not user.is_active %}
                    <span class="badge bg-warning text-dark">{% translate "Account inactive - cannot contribute" %}</span>
                {% else %}
                    {% url 'login' as login_url_contrib %}
                    <a href="{{ login_url_contrib }}?next={{ request.path }}#user-contributions-section" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">{% translate "Login to Contribute" %}</a>
                {% endif %}
            </div>
            {# Community Consensus Overview #}
            <div class="mb-4">
                <div class="row">
                    {% for flag in all_flags_info %} {# Iterate through all possible flags #}
                        {% with consensus=user_consensus_severity|get_item:flag.symbol %}
                        {% if consensus %} {# Only show if users have rated this category #}
                            <div class="col-md-6">
                                <details class="community-details">
                                    <summary class="descriptor-item">
                                        <span class="descriptor-icon material-symbols-outlined">{{ flag.symbol }}</span>
                                        <span class="descriptor-name">{{ flag.description }}</span>
                                        <span class="descriptor-severity">
                                            {# User Consensus Rating #}
                                            <span class="d-block severity-label">{% blocktranslate with count=consensus.count total=consensus.total %}Users ({{ count }}/{{ total }}):{% endblocktranslate %} {{ consensus.rating_display }} <span class="severity-circle {{ consensus.rating_css_class }}"></span></span>
                                        </span>
                                    </summary>
                                    <div class="user-comments-for-category p-2 border-top border-secondary">
                                        {% with category_contributions=contributions_by_category|get_item:flag.symbol %}
                                            {% if category_contributions %}
                                                {% for contrib in category_contributions|slice:":5" %}
                                                    <div class="small mb-1 {% if contrib.is_spoiler %}text-warning border border-warning rounded p-1{% endif %}">
                                                        <strong>{{ contrib.user.username }}:</strong>
                                                        {% if contrib.content %} {{ contrib.content|linebreaksbr }}{% endif %}
                                                        {% if contrib.is_spoiler %} <span class="badge bg-warning text-dark">{% translate "Spoiler" %}</span>{% endif %}
                                                        <div class="comment-actions float-end"> {# Actions for individual comments #}
                                                            {% if user.is_authenticated and user != contrib.user %}{% if user not in contrib.flagged_by.all %}<form action="{% url 'ratings:flag_contribution' contrib.id %}" method="post" style="display: inline;">{% csrf_token %}<button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-warning comment-action-btn py-0 px-1" title="{% translate 'Flag this contribution' %}"><i class="fa-regular fa-flag"></i></button></form>{% else %}<span class="text-secondary small"><i class="fa-solid fa-flag"></i></span>{% endif %}{% endif %}
                                                            {% if user.is_staff or user == contrib.user %}<form action="{% url 'ratings:delete_contribution' contrib.id %}" method="post" style="display: inline;" onsubmit="return confirm('{% translate "Are you sure you want to delete this contribution?" %}');">{% csrf_token %}<button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger comment-action-btn py-0 px-1" title="{% translate 'Delete this contribution' %}"><i class="fa-regular fa-trash-can"></i></button></form>{% endif %}
                                                        </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                {% endfor %}
                                                {% if category_contributions|length > 5 %}<p class="small text-secondary mb-0 mt-1 fst-italic">{% blocktranslate count remaining_count=category_contributions|length|add:"-5" %}...and {{ remaining_count }} more comment.{% plural %}...and {{ remaining_count }} more comments.{% endblocktranslate %}</p>{% endif %}
                                            {% else %}
                                                <p class="small text-secondary mb-0">{% translate "No user comments for this category yet." %}</p>
                                            {% endif %}
                                        {% endwith %}
                                    </div>
                                </details>
                            </div>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% endwith %}
                    {% endfor %}
                    {% if not user_consensus_severity %}
                        <p class="col-12 text-secondary small">{% translate "No user contributions have rated specific content concerns yet." %}</p>
                    {% else %}
                        <div class="col-12 mt-2"><small class="text-secondary">{% translate "Click on a concern to see user comments specific to that category." %}</small></div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

{# --- Row 4: Discussion Comments (Keep as is) --- #}
{# ... #}
<div class="row"><div class="col-12"><section class="comments-section" id="comments-section"><h4 class="section-title">{% translate "Discussion Comments" %}</h4>{% for comment in all_comments %}{% if {% block extra_js %}
{# Combined JS #}
<script>
    document.getElementById('copy-link-btn')?.addEventListener('click', function() { navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href).then(() => { const successMsg = document.getElementById('copy-link-success'); if (successMsg) { successMsg.style.display = 'inline'; setTimeout(() => { successMsg.style.display = 'none'; }, 2500); } }).catch(err => { console.error('Failed to copy link: ', err); alert('{% translate "Failed to copy link." %}'); }); });
    const sharePopups = document.querySelectorAll('.share-popup'); sharePopups.forEach(link => { link.addEventListener('click', function(e) { e.preventDefault(); const url = this.href; const windowFeatures = 'width=600,height=400,resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes'; window.open(url, 'ShareWindow', windowFeatures); }); });
    // TODO: Add JS to handle modal display if form has errors on page load?
</script>
{% endblock %}

{% extends "base.html" %}
{% load static %}
{% load i18n %}

{% block title %}{{ page_title }}{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="row">
    {# --- Sidebar for Filters --- #}
    <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-4 order-md-2 mb-4">
        <form method="GET" action="{% if developer_slug %}{% url 'ratings:games_by_developer' developer_slug=developer_slug %}{% elif publisher_slug %}{% url 'ratings:games_by_publisher' publisher_slug=publisher_slug %}{% else %}{% url 'ratings:game_list' %}{% endif %}" class="filter-sort-form card bg-element">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">{% translate "Refine Search" %}</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                 {% if search_query %}<input type="hidden" name="q" value="{{ search_query }}">{% endif %}

                {# Tier Filter (Keep text) #}
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="tierFilter" class="form-label form-label-sm">{% translate "Rating Tier" %}</label>
                  <select class="form-select form-select-sm" id="tierFilter" name="tier">
                    <option value="" {% if not selected_tier %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "All Tiers" %}</option>
                    {% for tier in all_tiers %}
                      <option value="{{ tier.tier_code }}" {% if selected_tier == tier.tier_code %}selected{% endif %}>{{ tier.display_name }}</option>
                    {% endfor %}
                  </select>
                </div>

                {# Flag Filter (Keep text) #}
                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label for="flagFilter" class="form-label form-label-sm">{% translate "Content Flags" %}</label>
                    <select class="form-select form-select-sm" id="flagFilter" name="flag">
                        <option value="" {% if not selected_flag %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Any Flags" %}</option>
                        {% for flag in all_flags %}
                            <option value="{{ flag.symbol }}" {% if selected_flag == flag.symbol %}selected{% endif %}>{{ flag.description }}</option>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </select>
                </div>

                 {# Platforms (Keep text) #}
                 <div class="mb-3">
                    <label class="form-label form-label-sm">{% translate "Platforms" %}</label>
                    <div class="filter-platform-list">
                        {% for platform_item in platform_list_for_template %}
                        <div class="form-check mb-1">
                            <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="platform" value="{{ platform_item.code }}" id="platform_{{ platform_item.code }}" {% if platform_item.code in selected_platforms %}checked{% endif %}>
                            <label class="form-check-label small" for="platform_{{ platform_item.code }}">{{ platform_item.name }}</label>
                        </div>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </div>
                 </div>

                {# Sort By (Keep text) #}
                <div class="mb-0">
                  <label for="sortFilter" class="form-label form-label-sm">{% translate "Sort By" %}</label>
                  <select class="form-select form-select-sm" id="sortFilter" name="sort">
                    <option value="-date_added" {% if sort_by == '-date_added' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Date Added (Newest)" %}</option>
                    <option value="date_added" {% if sort_by == 'date_added' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Date Added (Oldest)" %}</option>
                    <option value="title" {% if sort_by == 'title' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Title (A-Z)" %}</option>
                    <option value="-title" {% if sort_by == '-title' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Title (Z-A)" %}</option>
                    <option value="-release_date" {% if sort_by == '-release_date' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Release Date (Newest)" %}</option>
                    <option value="release_date" {% if sort_by == 'release_date' %}selected{% endif %}>{% translate "Release Date (Oldest)" %}</option>
                  </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="card-footer text-end"> {# Apply Button: Icon #}
                 <button type="submit" class="btn btn-sm btn-primary filter-apply-btn" title="{% translate 'Apply Filters' %}">
                     <span class="material-symbols-outlined" style="vertical-align: middle;">filter_alt</span>
                 </button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
    {# --- End Sidebar --- #}

    {# --- Main Content Area --- #}
    <div class="col-lg-9 col-md-8 order-md-1">
        {# --- Page Header with Search --- #}
        <div class="page-header d-block d-md-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-3">
            <h1 class="mb-2 mb-md-0">{{ page_title }}</h1>
            <form method="GET" action="{% url 'ratings:game_list' %}" class="d-flex search-form ms-md-auto" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <input class="form-control me-2" type="search" placeholder="{% translate 'Search Title/Dev...' %}" aria-label="{% translate 'Search' %}" name="q" value="{{ search_query|default:'' }}">
                {# Search Button: Icon #}
                <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary flex-shrink-0" type="submit" title="{% translate 'Search' %}">
                     <span class="material-symbols-outlined" style="vertical-align: middle;">search</span>
                </button>
            </form>
        </div>

        {% if filter_description %}
            <div class="alert alert-info small d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center" role="alert">
                <span>{{ filter_description|safe }}</span>
                {# Clear Filter Link: Icon #}
                <a href="{% url 'ratings:game_list' %}" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary ms-3" title="{% translate 'Clear Filter' %}">
                    <span class="material-symbols-outlined" style="vertical-align: middle;">close</span>
                </a>
            </div>
        {% endif %}

        {# --- Game Grid --- #}
        <div class="row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-2 row-cols-lg-3 g-4">
            {% for game in games_page %}
            <div class="col">
                {% include 'ratings/includes/game_card_snippet.html' with game=game %}
            </div>
            {% empty %}
            <p class="col-12 text-center text-secondary mt-4">
                {% if search_query or selected_tier or selected_flag or selected_platforms %}
                    {% url 'ratings:game_list' as all_games_url %}
                    {% blocktranslate %}No games found matching your criteria. <a href="{{ all_games_url }}" class="link-secondary">View all games?</a>{% endblocktranslate %}
                {% else %}
                    {% translate "No games rated yet." %}
                {% endif %}
            </p>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>

        {# --- Pagination (with Icons) --- #}
        {% if games_page.has_other_pages %}
            <nav aria-label="{% translate 'Game list navigation' %}" class="mt-5">
              <ul class="pagination justify-content-center">
                {% if games_page.has_previous %}
                  <li class="page-item"><a class="page-link" href="?page=1{% for key, value_list in request.GET.lists %}{% for value in value_list %}{% if key != 'page' %}&{{ key }}={{ value }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}" title="{% translate 'First page' %}"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">first_page</span></a></li>
                  <li class="page-item"><a class="page-link" href="?page={{ games_page.previous_page_number }}{% for key, value_list in request.GET.lists %}{% for value in value_list %}{% if key != 'page' %}&{{ key }}={{ value }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}" title="{% translate 'Previous page' %}"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">chevron_left</span></a></li>
                {% else %}
                  <li class="page-item disabled"><span class="page-link"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">first_page</span></span></li>
                  <li class="page-item disabled"><span class="page-link"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">chevron_left</span></span></li>
                {% endif %}
                <li class="page-item disabled"><span class="page-link">{% blocktranslate %}Page {{ games_page.number }} of {{ games_page.paginator.num_pages }}{% endblocktranslate %}</span></li>
                {% if games_page.has_next %}
                  <li class="page-item"><a class="page-link" href="?page={{ games_page.next_page_number }}{% for key, value_list in request.GET.lists %}{% for value in value_list %}{% if key != 'page' %}&{{ key }}={{ value }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}" title="{% translate 'Next page' %}"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">chevron_right</span></a></li>
                  <li class="page-item"><a class="page-link" href="?page={{ games_page.paginator.num_pages }}{% for key, value_list in request.GET.lists %}{% for value in value_list %}{% if key != 'page' %}&{{ key }}={{ value }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}" title="{% translate 'Last page' %}"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">last_page</span></a></li>
                {% else %}
                  <li class="page-item disabled"><span class="page-link"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">chevron_right</span></span></li>
                  <li class="page-item disabled"><span class="page-link"><span class="material-symbols-outlined">last_page</span></span></li>
                {% endif %}
              </ul>
            </nav>
        {% endif %}
        {# --- END: Pagination --- #}
    </div>
    {# --- End Main Content Area --- #}
</div>
{% endblock %}

        font-size: 1.2em;
        vertical-align: -3px;
    }

{# templates/ratings/glossary.html - UPDATED to show severity words #}
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% load static %}
{% load i18n %}

{% block title %}{% translate "MGC Glossary" %}{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="page-header">
  <h1>{% translate "Glossary of Terms" %}</h1>
</div>

<div class="glossary-content">
    {% url 'ratings:methodology' as methodology_url %}
    <p class="lead text-secondary">
        {% blocktranslate %}Understanding the terms used in the Muslim Game Classification (MGC). For the full detailed process, see our{% endblocktranslate %} <a href="{{ methodology_url }}">{% blocktranslate %}Rating Methodology{% endblocktranslate %}</a>.
    </p>

    <h3 class="mt-4">{% translate "Rating Tiers" %}</h3>
    <dl class="row">
        {# Iterate through tiers passed from view #}
        {% for tier in all_tiers %}
            <dt class="col-sm-3">
                <span class="rating-badge rating-{{ tier.tier_code }}" style="background-color: var(--rating-{{ tier.tier_code }});">
                    <span class="material-symbols-outlined rating-icon">{{ tier.icon_name }}</span>
                    {# Display the translated name directly #}
                    <span class="rating-label">{{ tier.display_name }}</span>
                </span>
            </dt>
            {# Display the translated description directly #}
            <dd class="col-sm-9">{{ tier.description }}</dd>
        {% endfor %}
    </dl>

     <h3 class="mt-4">{% translate "Severity Levels (for Breakdown Categories)" %}</h3>
    <dl class="row">
        {# Manually list severity levels using their display names from choices #}
        {# Assuming Game.SEVERITY_CHOICES is ('N', _('None')), ('L', _('Mild')), etc. #}
        {# We access the display value directly using get_SEVERITY_CHOICES_display() which isn't ideal here #}
        {# A better way is to define them explicitly or pass the dict from the view #}

        <dt class="col-sm-3"><span class="severity-circle severity-n"></span> {% translate "None" %}</dt>
        <dd class="col-sm-9">{% blocktranslate %}No significant concerns identified regarding direct action or normalization.{% endblocktranslate %}</dd>

        <dt class="col-sm-3"><span class="severity-circle severity-l"></span> {% translate "Mild" %}</dt>
        <dd class="col-sm-9">{% blocktranslate %}Minor issues present, potentially avoidable, infrequent, or contextually less impactful. Not presented positively or normalized. Minimal risk.{% endblocktranslate %}</dd>

        <dt class="col-sm-3"><span class="severity-circle severity-m"></span> {% translate "Moderate" %}</dt>
        <dd class="col-sm-9">{% blocktranslate %}Moderate concerns. Problematic elements (not major sins/Kufr) may be present and optional OR somewhat normalized neutrally/slightly positively. Requires player vigilance.{% endblocktranslate %}</dd>

         <dt class="col-sm-3"><span class="severity-circle severity-s"></span> {% translate "Severe" %}</dt>
        <dd class="col-sm-9">{% blocktranslate %}Severe concerns. Problematic actions (short of major sins/Kufr) strongly encouraged/rewarded OR Haram elements difficult/impossible to avoid OR impermissible lifestyles/beliefs (short of Kufr/Shirk) actively promoted/normalized, OR explicitly involves required/unavoidable simulation/engagement in major sins or acts of Kufr/Shirk.{% endblocktranslate %}</dd>

    </dl>

    <p><a href="{% url 'home' %}" class="back-link mt-3">{% translate "← Back to Home" %}</a></p>
</div>

{% endblock %}

=== FILE: C:\Job\MGC\templates\registration\login.html ===

{% extends "base.html" %}
{% load static %}
{% load i18n %} {# <--- ADD THIS LINE #}

{% block title %}{% translate "Login" %} - {% translate "MGC" %}{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="registration-form-container">
    <div class="row justify-content-center">
        <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-5">
            <div class="form-wrapper p-4 p-md-5">
                <h2 class="text-center mb-4 form-title">{% translate "Login" %}</h2>

                {% if form.errors %}
                    <div class="alert alert-danger form-error-alert" role="alert">
                       {# Translate standard login error #}
                       {% translate "Your username and password didn't match. Please try again." %}
                    </div>
                {% endif %}

                {% if next %}
                    {% if user.is_authenticated %}
                    <p class="text-secondary text-center small mb-3">{% translate "Your account doesn't have access to this page. To proceed, please login with an account that has access." %}</p>
                    {% else %}
                    <p class="text-secondary text-center small mb-3">{% translate "Please login to see this page." %}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                {% endif %}

                 {% if messages %}
                    {% for message in messages %}
                        <div class="alert {% if message.tags == 'error' %}alert-danger{% elif message.tags %}alert-{{ message.tags }}{% else %}alert-info{% endif %}" role="alert">
                            {{ message }} {# Messages from views are already translated #}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                 {% endif %}

                <form method="post" action="{% url 'login' %}">
                    {% csrf_token %}

                    <div class="mb-3 form-field-group">
                        {# Label is handled by Django's auth form translation #}
                        <label for="{{ form.username.id_for_label }}" class="form-label">{{ form.username.label_tag }}</label>
                        {# Manually add form-control class to username field #}
                        <input type="text" name="{{ form.username.html_name }}" class="form-control" id="{{ form.username.id_for_label }}" required>
                         {% if form.username.errors %}
                            <div class="form-error-text mt-1">
                                {% for error in form.username.errors %}<span>{{ error }}</span><br>{% endfor %}
                            </div>
                         {% endif %}
                    </div>

                     <div class="mb-4 form-field-group">
                        {# Label is handled by Django's auth form translation #}
                        <label for="{{ form.password.id_for_label }}" class="form-label">{{ form.password.label_tag }}</label>
                         {# Manually add form-control class to password field #}
                        <input type="password" name="{{ form.password.html_name }}" class="form-control" id="{{ form.password.id_for_label }}" required>
                        {% if form.password.errors %}
                            <div class="form-error-text mt-1">
                                {% for error in form.password.errors %}<span>{{ error }}</span><br>{% endfor %}
                            </div>
                         {% endif %}
                    </div>

                    <div class="d-grid">
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-submit btn-lg">{% translate "Login" %}</button>
                    </div>
                    <input type="hidden" name="next" value="{{ next }}">
                </form>

                <p class="text-center mt-3 mb-1 small form-switch-link">
                    <a href="{% url 'password_reset' %}" >{% translate "Lost password?" %}</a>
                </p>
                 <p class="text-center mt-1 small form-switch-link">{% translate "Don't have an account?" %} <a href="{% url 'signup' %}">{% translate "Sign Up" %}</a></p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

=== FILE: C:\Job\MGC\templates\registration\signup.html ===

{# templates/registration/signup.html (with reCAPTCHA and widget_tweaks) #}
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% load static %}
{% load i18n %}
{% load widget_tweaks %} {# Load widget_tweaks #}

{% block title %}{% translate "Sign Up" %} - {% translate "MGC" %}{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="registration-form-container">
    <div class="row justify-content-center">
        <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-6">
            <div class="form-wrapper p-4 p-md-5">
                <h2 class="text-center mb-4 form-title">{% translate "Sign Up" %}</h2>

                 {% if form.non_field_errors %}
                     <div class="alert alert-danger form-error-alert" role="alert">
                         {% for error in form.non_field_errors %}
                           <p class="mb-0 small">{{ error }}</p>
                         {% endfor %}
                     </div>
                 {% endif %}

                 {% if messages %}
                    {% for message in messages %}
                        {# Check for specific form error message tag #}
                        {% if 'form_error' in message.tags or message.level == 40 %}
                            <div class="alert alert-danger form-error-alert" role="alert">
                                {{ message }}
                            </div>
                        {% elif message.level >= 25 %} {# Show success/info/warning #}
                             <div class="alert {% if message.tags %}alert-{{ message.tags }}{% else %}alert-info{% endif %}" role="alert">
                                {{ message }}
                             </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                 {% endif %}

                <form method="post" action="{% url 'signup' %}">
                    {% csrf_token %}

                    {# Loop through form fields - EXCLUDING CAPTCHA #}
                    {% for field in form %}
                        {% if field.name != 'captcha' %}
                            <div class="mb-3 form-field-group">
                                <label for="{{ field.id_for_label }}" class="form-label">{{ field.label_tag }}</label>
                                {# Use widget_tweaks to add class #}
                                {% render_field field class+="form-control" %}
                                {% if field.errors %}
                                    <div class="form-error-text mt-1">
                                        {% for error in field.errors %}<span>{{ error }}</span><br>{% endfor %}
                                    </div>
                                {% elif field.help_text %}
                                    <div class="form-help-text mt-1">{{ field.help_text|safe }}</div>
                                {% endif %}
                            </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}

                     {# Render reCAPTCHA field using widget_tweaks #}
                    <div class="mb-3 form-field-group">
                        {# Optional: Add a label if you want #}
                        {# <label class="form-label">{% translate "Verification" %}</label> #}
                        {% render_field form.captcha %}
                        {% if form.captcha.errors %}
                            <div class="form-error-text mt-1">
                                {% for error in form.captcha.errors %}<span>{{ error }}</span><br>{% endfor %}
                            </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    </div>

                    <div class="d-grid mt-4">
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-submit btn-lg">{% translate "Sign Up" %}</button>
                    </div>
                </form>

                 <p class="text-center mt-4 form-switch-link">
                    {% translate "Already have an account?" %} <a href="{% url 'login' %}">{% translate "Login" %}</a>
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

   <script>const themeToggleBtn=document.getElementById("theme-toggle"),currentTheme=localStorage.getItem("theme")?localStorage.getItem("theme"):null,prefersDark=window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)"),toggleIcon=themeToggleBtn.querySelector(".material-symbols-outlined");function applyTheme(e){"light"===e?(document.body.classList.add("light-mode"),toggleIcon.textContent="dark_mode",localStorage.setItem("theme","light")):(document.body.classList.remove("light-mode"),toggleIcon.textContent="light_mode",localStorage.setItem("theme","dark"))}currentTheme?applyTheme(currentTheme):applyTheme(prefersDark.matches?"dark":"dark"),themeToggleBtn.addEventListener("click",()=>{let e=document.body.classList.contains("light-mode")?"dark":"light";applyTheme(e)}),prefersDark.addEventListener("change",e=>{localStorage.getItem("theme")||applyTheme(e.matches?"dark":"light")});const languageToggleBtn=document.getElementById("language-toggle"),languageToggleText=document.getElementById("language-toggle-text"),currentLangCode=document.documentElement.lang;"ar"===currentLangCode?(languageToggleText.textContent="EN",languageToggleBtn.title="{% translate 'Switch to English' %}"):(languageToggleText.textContent="\u0639",languageToggleBtn.title="{% translate 'Switch to Arabic' %}"),languageToggleBtn.addEventListener("click",()=>{let e="ar"===currentLangCode?"lang-form-en":"lang-form-ar",t=document.getElementById(e);if(t){let n=t.querySelector('input[name="next"]');n&&(n.value=window.location.pathname+window.location.search),t.submit()}else console.error("Could not find language form:",e)});</script>
  {% endcompress %}
   {% block extra_js %}{% endblock %}
   <style> .small-icon { font-size: 1.1em; vertical-align: -2px; } </style>
</body>
</html>

{# templates/registration/signup.html #}
{% extends "base.html" %}

{% block title %}Sign Up{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<div class="row justify-content-center">
    <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-6">
        <div class="card bg-element">
            <div class="card-body p-4">
                <h2 class="text-center mb-4">Sign Up</h2>

                 {# Display non-field errors (if any) #}
                 {% if form.non_field_errors %}
                     <div class="alert alert-danger" role="alert">
                         {% for error in form.non_field_errors %}
                           <p class="mb-0">{{ error }}</p>
                         {% endfor %}
                     </div>
                 {% endif %}

                 {# Display messages from views.py (success/error) #}
                 {% if messages %}
                    {% for message in messages %}
                        <div class="alert {% if message.tags %}alert-{{ message.tags }}{% else %}alert-info{% endif %}" role="alert">
                            {{ message }}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                 {% endif %}


                <form method="post" action="{% url 'signup' %}"> {# Point action to the signup URL name #}
                    {% csrf_token %}

                    {# Render each field with its label and errors #}
                    {% for field in form %}
                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="{{ field.id_for_label }}" class="form-label">{{ field.label }}</label>
                            {# Add form-control class to the input widget #}
                            {{ field.as_widget|attr:"class:form-control" }}
                            {# Display help text if exists #}
                            {% if field.help_text %}
                                <div class="form-text text-secondary">{{ field.help_text|safe }}</div>
                            {% endif %}
                            {# Display field-specific errors #}
                            {% if field.errors %}
                                <div class="invalid-feedback d-block"> {# Force display #}
                                    {% for error in field.errors %}
                                        <span>{{ error }}</span>
                                    {% endfor %}
                                </div>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}

                    <div class="d-grid mt-4">
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary filter-apply-btn">Sign Up</button>
                    </div>
                </form>

                 <p class="text-center mt-3 small">
                    Already have an account? <a href="{% url 'login' %}" class="text-secondary">Login</a>
                </p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

{% block extra_js %}
{# Simple template filter to add attributes (like class) to form widgets #}
{% include "includes/attr_filter.html" %}
{% endblock %}

=== FILE: C:\Job\MGC\manage.py ===

#!/usr/bin/env python
"""Django's command-line utility for administrative tasks."""
import os
import sys


def main():
    """Run administrative tasks."""
    os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'mgc_project.settings')
    try:
        from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line
    except ImportError as exc:
        raise ImportError(
            "Couldn't import Django. Are you sure it's installed and "
            "available on your PYTHONPATH environment variable? Did you "
            "forget to activate a virtual environment?"
        ) from exc
    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
